name: 20XX (itch)
description:
A post-apocalyptic short platformer/boss-rush made for #gbjam.

"It's the year 20XX. Nations have dissolved, religions have collapsed... the only thing left is MONEY.

You are one of THE SAINTS, paragons of excellence that look over humanity.

Prove that you truly are THE BEST of them! KILL all 4 other saints and everything will finally be yours."
